Oxygen XML Editor is a Java-based application and all its API is Java-based. The entire user interface in Oxygen (buttons, views, dialogs) is built on top of the Java Swing architecture. The entire Javadoc API documentation is available here:
.
A Workspace Access plugin can be implemented either in Java or in Javascript . Sample Java-based Workspace Access plugins can be found on the Oxygen XML GitHub page .
